name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Sound**  
Taking place from June 12–14, 2026, Best Kept Secret returns with a vibrant lineup of 52 artists spanning a wide spectrum of genres and styles. From the pulsating beats of electronic and house to the raw energy of post-punk, rap, and indie rock, this year’s festival promises an eclectic celebration of music. With genres ranging from Afrobeat and psychedelic rock to dream pop and experimental rock, there’s something to satisfy every kind of music lover. Notably, 98.1% of the artists have Spotify links available, ensuring fans can dive into their music before the festival.

This year’s lineup reflects a truly global gathering of talent, with artists representing 16 countries. While the USA, the Netherlands, and the UK lead the pack, the roster also includes acts from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and Greece, highlighting the festival’s commitment to showcasing diverse cultural perspectives. Additionally, 23% of the performers identify as people of color, enriching the event with voices and sounds from a variety of backgrounds.

Gender representation continues to evolve, with 19% of the lineup featuring female artists or female-led acts, and a notable presence of mixed-gender groups. While there’s room for improvement, this diversity adds to the festival’s inclusive ethos. With an average artist rating of 7.2 (based on 76.9% rated acts), the 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret is set to offer an unforgettable weekend of discovery, community, and genre-spanning sounds.
